channel.title: 15% Install Problem
channel.description:
So I was installing Ubuntu 7.10 on my other computer and either I'm retarded and missed something, or something is fucked with my install. Everytime I try to install Ubuntu, it stops at 15%. Now I've given it way more time then anything should need to install, try 18 hours but nothing. It's still at 15% I hadn't touched the computer or anything to do with it the whole time.
[img]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/5722/screenshotsz3.png[/img]
Any ideas what I'm missing or failing at?
Thanks, -Mh

item.title: 15% Install Problem
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Thanks Mopar, I always just ended up finding the Grub 15 Error, not 15% install error…

-Mh

Read full topic

item.title: 15% Install Problem
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I experienced that installing on a dodgy HD. All except it would just close down 15% of the way through.

Read full topic

item.title: 15% Install Problem
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

You aren’t the only person having these problems, some quick googling reveals:
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=411642
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=3643437
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=536474

It seems the general consensus is that the alternate install CD works. Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: 15% Install Problem
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I wondered about that, but it detects filesystems earlier on and has no problems with it.
I have yet to find anything about this any where else, oh well I’ll just use Alt.

-Mh

Read full topic

item.title: 15% Install Problem
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Judging from ‘detecting filesystems’ You could have a strange harddrive setup or filesystem.

Read full topic

item.title: 15% Install Problem
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Oh ok.
Is there any specific reason I’m having this problem?

-Mh

Read full topic

item.title: 15% Install Problem
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

That happened to me on 7.04, try using the alternate install.

Read full topic

So I was installing Ubuntu 7.10 on my other computer and either I’m retarded and missed something, or something is fucked with my install.
